p: The A. herba alba essential oil contained piperitone (26.5%), ethyl cinnamate (9.5%), camphor (7.7%) and hexadecanoic acid (6.9%) as major compounds representing 50.6% of the oil. The major constituents of C. officinalis oil were α-cadinol (21.2%), carvone (18.2%) and cadinene (9.1%) those representing 48.5% of the oil (Table 3).
